allowedCharacters: The {name} may only contain the following characters: {allowedCharacters}
confirm: The {target} and the {name} do not match.
containsDigits: The {name} must contain at least one digit (0-9).
containsLowercase: The {name} must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z).
containsNonAlphanumeric: The {name} must contain at least one special character (e.g. !@/$%&*_+-).
containsUppercase: The {name} must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z).
email: Please enter a valid email address.
identifier: The {name} cannot start with a digit and it may only contain letters, digits and underscores (_).
maximumLength: The {name} cannot contain more than {maximumLength} characters.
maximumValue: The {name} must be lesser than or equal to {maximumValue}.
minimumLength: The {name} must contain at least {minimumLength} characters.
minimumValue: The {name} must be greater than or equal to {minimumValue}.
pattern: The {name} must match the following pattern: {pattern}
phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
slug: The {name} must be composed of non-empty alphanumeric words separated by hyphens (-).
uniqueCharacters: The {name} must contain at least {uniqueCharacters} different characters.
url: The {name} is not a valid URL. Valid URLs start with http:// or https://.
